import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const TeamComponent = () => { let [workers, setWorkers]=useState([]); let getWorkers = async () => { let response = await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/workers/?limit=4') let data = response.json() setWorkers(data) } return (
Our Team

Meet Our Team Members

{workers.map((worker, index) => (
{worker.first_name} {worker.last_name}

{worker.specialization}

))}
) } export default TeamComponent
